title: Sperm donor with rare cancer-causing mutation fathers nearly 200 children across Europe
description: A sperm donor who carried a cancer-causing gene mutation fathered nearly 200 children, an investigation by 14 European news organizations show.
content: A sperm donor who carried a cancer-causing gene mutation fathered nearly 200 children, an investigation by 14 European news organizations show.
